events.message: I recently received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund. This was not what I paid for.
The customer's message mentioned refund and a wrong product received, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to Customer Service Agent Julia for resolution.
Hello! I’m Julia and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today. Can you please provide your order number?
Could you please share the order number and a brief description of the item you received versus what you ordered?
The order number is 123456789. Instead of the blue jacket I ordered, I received a pair of shoes. I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund after you return the incorrect item. I will provide you with a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the return instructions.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send back the incorrect item and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I shipped the item back yesterday using the prepaid label. Thanks again for the smooth process.
We have received the returned item and successfully processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 2-3 business days.
Closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you need any further help.
